name: enable_parent_shader
example_comment: The above snippet forces the <%= doc_class_name  %> to use its own shader when rendering.
description: This forces this <%= doc_class_name  %> to use its parent's shader during rendering.

parameters.name: use_parent_shader
parameters.desc: `true` if you want this <%= doc_class_name  %> to use its parent's shader instead of its own, otherwise `false`.
